name: Text to Audio
description: Converts text files (.txt or .md) to audio files using high-quality text-to-speech synthesis
author: Shinkai

model_path.description: Local path to Kokoro ONNX model file. Default: kokoro-v0_19.onnx

voices_path.description: Local path to JSON file defining available voices. Default: voices.json

text.description: Input text content to synthesize into speech. No length limit but longer text takes more time

voice.description: Voice ID from voices.json to use for synthesis. Default: af_sky

language.description: ISO language code (en-gb, en-us, fr-fr, etc). Must match voice language. Default: en-gb

speed.description: Playback speed multiplier (0.5-2.0). Higher is faster. Default: 1.0

output_format.description: Audio file format (only wav supported). Default: wav

output_file.description: Absolute path to generated WAV audio file. Created in system temp directory

duration.description: Length of generated audio in seconds. Varies with text length and speed

sample_rate.description: Audio sampling rate in Hz (e.g., 44100). Determined by voice model
